tool_description: The Bin2Dec Converter API is a powerful tool for developers and data scientists, offering seamless binary-to-decimal conversion capabilities. Binary (base-2) and decimal (base-10) number systems are common in computer science and mathematics, and this API simplifies the process of converting binary numbers into their decimal equivalents.
name: Bin2Dec Converter API
title: Bin2Dec Converter API

api_list.name: postDecimal
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bin2dec-converter-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bin2dec-converter-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
